page.title: 15Housing in Cressage.
page.content: Our survey had 76 replies. Of these, 53 families owned their homes, and 23 were rented. 85% of the{dwellings}are houses, 10% are{bungalows}and 5% are flats. In a typical{living-room}you would probably find a{televison,}a{record {player,}a{radio,}a{tape player}and, possibly, a{video recorder.}There would also be a{sofa}and two{arm {chairs,}a{fire place}and a{side board, {usally for keeping{china}in. The fire might be fuelled by coal or wood. Many homes have{central heating, fired here by solid fuel, electricity or oil. There is{no gas}supply. In a garden most famlies have a{sand {pit}for children to play in, with a {swing}and somtimes a{slide.}There might also be{flower-beds,}a{lawn,}a {picnic table,}a{green house}and a {garden shed.}
